meanings.definition: リトロ (月のクレーター)
meanings.english_definition: A lunar crater located on the near side of the Moon, in the southeastern part of Mare Crisium.

examples.sentence: Littrow is located near the landing site of Apollo 17.
examples.translation: リトロはアポロ17号の着陸地点の近くに位置しています。

etymology.value: Named after Joseph Johann von Littrow, an Austrian astronomer.
